text: The portico at the front, extending across the width of the temple, was twenty cubits long 3:4 20 cubits is approximately 30 feet or 9.1 meters; also in verses 8, 11, and 13. and twenty cubits high.3:4 Some LXX and Syriac manuscripts; Hebrew 120 cubits high (approximately 180 feet or 54.9 meters) He overlaid the inside with pure gold.
